Top 10 reasons why you should NOT hate me

In this TED Talk, I will be presenting the top 10 reasons why you should not hate me.
A presentation by your doofus!

Reason #1: A living Human Meme

Source of all your goofyness, adding the colors to your life.

Reason #2: Can Cook Food

So You dont have to, And all kinds, homemade food, bougie food, you name it

Reason #3: Can Write Okay Poems for You

Let me be your poet, so you can be my poem.

Reason #4: Undeveloped Frontal Lobe

Yep, Nobody knows this better than you. I have literally 2 brain cells.

sorry not sorry

Reason #5: A computer Genius, Sometimes

Your 24x7 tech support, 365 days

Need help with your computer? I can help you with that.

Reason #6: Your #1 Gossip Partner

A hot gossip? Spill any Tea? Want to vent or rant about anything fraustrating? You name it, will listen to all of it.

And you will never be judged, I promise.

Reason #7: Golden Retriever Energy

Dumb and gets so damn excited aboout every small thing, will always hype you up!

Reason #8: Professional Yapper

Whether it is bombarding you with office gossips, or random ass nerdy facts.
Family Drama? Tea from colleagues? You name it gurl ðŸ’…

Reason #9: Will Take Good Photographs of you

Happy to be be your personal Photographer and take amazingly good photos of you.

Reason #10: Will Make stupid websites like this

Just to make you smile :)

Flowers For You

And I am sorry for all the times I made you feel crappy.

Real Flowers soon babe, I promise.

Thank You for Attending my Ted Talk!
